title: Ornot’s New Gravel Sweater
content:
The latest in Ornot‘s limited edition apparel line made from deadstock fabric is its all-new Gravel Sweater. Blending off-bike lifestyle and on-bike performance, the Merino Gravel Sweater is made in the USA with deadstock Polartec Power Wool…

The Gravel Sweater has all the perks of extra-fine merino without spinning up new fabric. While the fabric is the main story, the Gravel Sweater has a hidden rear pocket perfect for a phone, snacks, or other ride essentials. It’s naturally antimicrobial, moisture-wicking, warm when wet, and comes in both men’s and women’s silhouettes and two colors, Charcoal and Saphire.

Specs:

  • Domestically sourced Polartec® Power Wool™
  • Bi-component knit – Durable abrasion-resistant face.
  • Constructed with bluesign®-approved materials
  • Temp range from 45-60 degrees and perfect for layering.
  • Shape retention and 4-way stretch for all-day comfort.
  • 51% recycled poly, 42% wool, 7% spandex (merino wool is placed on the inside)
  • Concealed 5″x7″ rear zip pocket for snacks, sunglasses, or even a phone.
  • Sewn by hand in the USA.
  • MSRP: $145

Check out more at Ornot.
